result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ ag na Naitsiṫe ċoṁ maiṫIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: I well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.
result.ga: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháin
result.orig: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháin
result.html: Is maith is cuimhin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair amháinI well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ is cuiṁin liom taisteal go Illinois as Éirinn uair aṁáinI well remember travelling to Illinois from Ireland once.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].

result.eng: But the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.
result.ga: Ach tá na blaganna Gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maith
result.orig: Ach tá na blaganna Gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maith
result.html: Ach tá na blaganna Gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maithBut the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.
result.ponchtml: Aċ tá na blaganna Gaeilge ar fiú iad a léaṁ tearc go maiṫBut the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.

result.eng: Citizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ga: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.orig: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.html: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an coinċeap é iriseoireaċt an tsaoránaiġ aċ i ndeireaḋ ama caiṫfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: It's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ga: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.orig: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.html: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ a rinne tú an ḟírinne a inse agus ar a ẛon sin ní ḃainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.

result.eng: I remember well the afternoon I left.
result.ga: Is maith is cuimhin liom an tráthnóna a d'imigh mé
